dict.acceptation: 草，青草；草地，草坪；告密者；〈俚〉龙须菜；
用草覆盖；使…长满草；使…吃草；

sent.orig: Almost everybody knows that grass means marijuana.
sent.trans: 几乎人人都知道grass指的是大麻。

sent.orig: Straw, grass basket, fan grass, straw, grass, and so on hundreds of toys-style suit.
sent.trans: 草垫、草篮、草扇、草席、草制玩具等数百种花色样式。

sent.orig: Ornamental grass such as mondo grass, pampas grass, blue fescue, etc.
sent.trans: 观赏植物包括粗草、蒲苇、牛毛草等。

sent.orig: Tanzanian hinterland here in width grass green grass, Linquan matched, the environment beautiful.
sent.trans: 这里腹地坦阔，草绿如茵，林泉相映，环境幽美。

sent.orig: Mary:>I like running on the grass.Why should I keep off the grass?
sent.trans: 玛莉：我喜欢在草地上跑步，我为什么得离开草地？
